IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: COLLEGE PREP EDUCATION WITH EMPHASIS ON KINDNESS, RESPECT AND INTEGRITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE SCHOOL'S MISSION IS TO EDUCATE STUDENTS FOR SUCCESS AT COLLEGE AND BEYOND, AND TO FOSTER KINDNESS, RESPECT AND INTEGRITY WITHIN A SAFE AND NURTURING ENVIRONMENT.
IRS990.Desc: THE HARKER SCHOOL IS A COEDUCATIONAL, INDEPENDENT, COLLEGE-PREPARATORY DAY SCHOOL SERVING STUDENTS IN TK-12TH GRADE. THE SCHOOL'S GOAL IS TO DEVELOP LIFELONG LEARNERS AND WELL-ROUNDED GLOBAL CITIZENS. THROUGH COMPREHENSIVE ACADEMIC AND CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS, THE HARKER SCHOOL PROVIDES A CHALLENGING AND BALANCED EDUCATION FOR COLLEGE-BOUND STUDENTS.

ContractorCompensationGrp.ServicesDesc: TRAVEL AGENCY FOR GROUP STUDENT TRAVEL

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF INDIVIDUAL FUNDS ESTABLISHED FOR A VARIETY OF PURPOSES.

THE ORGANIZATION EVALUATES ITS UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND WILL RECOGNIZE A LOSS CONTINGENCY WHEN IT IS PROBABLE THAT A LIABILITY HAS BEEN INCURRED AS OF THE DATE OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND THE AMOUNT OF THE LOSS CAN BE REASONABLY ESTIMATED. THE AMOUNT RECOGNIZED IS SUBJECT TO ESTIMATE AND MANAGEMENT JUDGEMENT WITH RESPECT TO THE LIKELY OUTCOME OF EACH UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION. THE AMOUNT THAT IS ULTIMATELY SUSTAINED FOR AN INDIVIDUAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION OR FOR ALL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS IN THE AGGREGATE COULD DIFFER FROM THE AMOUNT RECOGNIZED. AS OF MAY 31, 2023, MANAGEMENT DID NOT IDENTIFY ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS.
SCHOLARSHIPS RECORDED IN THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS NET OF REVENUES 8,263,562.
SCHOLARSHIPS RECORDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS NET OF REVENUES 8,263,562. EMPLOYEE RETENTION CREDIT -13,012.

THE HARKER SCHOOL ADMITS STUDENTS OF ANY RACE, COLOR, NATIONAL AND ETHNIC ORIGIN TO ALL THE RIGHTS, PRIVILEGES, AND ACTIVITIES GENERALLY ACCORDED OR MADE AVAILABLE TO STUDENTS AT THE SCHOOL. IT DOES NOT DISCRIMINATE ON THE BASIS OF RACE, COLOR, NATIONAL AND ETHNIC ORIGIN IN ADMINISTRATION OF ITS EDUCATIONAL POLICIES, ADMISSION POLICIES, SCHOLARSHIP AND LOAN PROGRAMS AND ATHLETIC OR OTHER SCHOOL ADMINISTERED PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 IS SUBMITTED TO THE CHAIR OF THE AUDIT COMMITTEE (A SUBCOMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES). THE AUDIT COMMITTEE IS AUTHORIZED TO APPROVE THE FORM 990 FOR PUBLICATION. THIS PROCEDURE HAS BEEN APPROVED BY THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE POLICY IS BROADCASTED TO ALL FACULTY AND STAFF VIA THE EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK WHICH EACH EMPLOYEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR REVIEWING. THE POLICY IS ALSO AVAILABLE ONLINE AT THE HARKER'S INTRANET WEBSITE. THE REPORTING PROCEDURAL INFORMATION IS EMBEDDED IN THE TEXT OF THE POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S COMPENSATION PACKAGE IS REVIEWED BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE AND THEN REVIEWED BY AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTING FIRM FOR REASONABLENESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FORM 1023 AND 990 AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST ONLY.
